title: [Large-Scale] Information Literacy Competency Enhancement for Workplace Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and general understanding of social activities
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, focusing on effectively utilizing information encountered in daily life.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three information sources required in various social contexts (workplace/community).
Learners can complete at least one problem-solving project using digital/social/physical information sources.
Learners record reflections on the relationship between knowledge and expertise developed during the information utilization process in a reflective journal at least three times.

resources: Mobile App for Information Retrieval Practice
Guide to Utilizing Smartphone Filming Features
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
